mapper.select: SELECT employeeNo, employeeName FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT employeeNo, employeeName FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE employeeName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{employeeName},'%') || employeeNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{employeeName},'%')
SELECT companyType, teamName, partName, phoneNumber FROM INTERPHONE
SELECT companyType, teamName, partName, phoneNumber FROM INTERPHONE WHERE phoneNumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%') || partName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')
SELECT chainId, chainName FROM CHAINTABLE
SELECT chainId, chainName FROM CHAINTABLE WHERE chainName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chainName},'%') || chainId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chainName},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OVERTIME ( acceptDate, acceptTime, accepter, caller, phoneNumber, acceptDescription, measureTime, cause, measures, remarks, typeOfProcessing, statusCode ) VALUES ( #{acceptDate}, #{acceptTime}, #{accepter}, #{caller}, #{phoneNumber}, #{acceptDescription}, #{measureTime}, #{cause}, #{measures}, #{remarks}, #{typeOfProcessing}, "01" )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(acceptNo) FROM OVERTIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OVERTIMEAPPROVAL( acceptNo, drafter, draftDate, approvalRequestDate, approvalLine, approvalDescription ) VALUES( #{acceptNo}, #{drafter}, now(), now(), #{approvalLine}, #{approvalDescription} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(codeType) FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE codeType LIKE "CTGY%"
SELECT codeType , codeValue , codeName FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE CODETYPE=#{codeType}
SELECT codeType , codeValue , codeName FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE CODETYPE=#{searchTypeString}

SELECT o.acceptNo, o.acceptDate, o.acceptTime, o.accepter, e.employeeName, o.caller, o.phoneNumber, o.acceptDescription, o.measureTime, o.cause, o.measures, o.remarks, o.typeOfProcessing, o.statusCode, mr.measurer, md.measureDescription FROM OVERTIME o JOIN MASTERTABLE m JOIN EMPLOYEE e JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 JOIN MEASURER mr JOIN MEASUREDESCRIPTION md JOIN RELATEDCHAIN rc ON (o.statusCode=m.codeValue) AND (o.accepter=e.employeeNo) AND (mr.measurer=e2.employeeNo) AND (o.acceptNo=mr.acceptNo) AND (o.acceptNo=md.acceptNo) AND (o.acceptNo=mr.acceptNo) AND (o.acceptNo=rc.acceptNo) WHERE 1=1
AND o.phoneNumber LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND e.employeeName LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND e2.employeeName LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND rc.relatedChain LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryChain}, '%') AND m.codeValue LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryStatus}, '%') AND m.codeType="CTGY_STATUS" GROUP BY o.acceptNo ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{categoryAcceptDate} = '오름차순' THEN o.acceptDate END ASC, CASE WHEN #{categoryAcceptDate} = '내림차순' THEN o.acceptDate END DESC, CASE WHEN #{categoryAcceptDate} = '접수일자' THEN o.acceptDate END DESC;

SELECT O.acceptNo, O.acceptDate, O.acceptTime, O.accepter, E.employeeName, O.caller, O.phoneNumber, O.acceptDescription, O.measureTime, O.cause, O.measures, O.remarks, O.typeOfProcessing, O.statusCode FROM OVERTIME O JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (O.accepter=E.employeeNo)
SELECT mr.acceptNo, mr.measurer, m.employeeName FROM MEASURER mr JOIN EMPLOYEE m ON (mr.measurer=m.employeeNo) WHERE acceptNo=#{acceptNo}
SELECT acceptNo, measureDescription FROM MEASUREDESCRIPTION WHERE acceptNo=#{acceptNo}

SELECT o.employeeNo, e.employeeName, o.sumOfOverTime, FLOOR(sumOfOverTime/8) AS amountOfAnnualVacation FROM OVERTIMEOFEMPLOYEE o JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON (o.employeeNo=e.employeeNo) WHERE o.employeeNo=#{employeeNo}

SELECT o.acceptNo , o.acceptDate , o.acceptTime , o.accepter , e.employeeName , o.caller , o.phoneNumber , o.acceptDescription , o.measureTime , o.cause , o.measures , o.remarks , o.typeOfProcessing , o.statusCode FROM OVERTIME o JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON o.accepter = e.employeeNo WHERE o.acceptNo = #{acceptNo};
SELECT rc.acceptNo, rc.relatedChain, c.chainName FROM RELATEDCHAIN rc JOIN CHAINTABLE c ON (rc.relatedChain=c.chainId) WHERE acceptNo=#{acceptNo}
SELECT companyType, teamName, partName, phoneNumber FROM INTERPHONE WHERE partName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{caller},'%') || phoneNumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{caller},'%')
SELECT employeeNo, employeeName FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE employeeName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{measurer},'%') || employeeNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{measurer},'%')
SELECT chainId, chainName FROM CHAINTABLE WHERE chainName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relatedChain},'%') || chainId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relatedChain},'%')
